items.sentence: I assume there\'s somebody somewhere who can do what needs to be done.
I can understand French fairly well, but I\'m not good at speaking it.
Didn\'t you know there used to be a Chinese restaurant on Park Street?
Many of my friends think that Tom and Mary are overprotective parents.
Mary has spent thousands of dollars on beauty products over the years.
Tom wanted to get back home before the kids realized that he had left.
Tom was a better chess player than Mary when they were in high school.
Tom was getting tired of hearing Mary bragging about winning the race.
Tom was going 50 over the speed limit when the police pulled him over.
I was surprised when I found out that Tom used to be a French teacher.
